description: The design showcases a bold and striking use of red and black, creating a highly dramatic and rebellious atmosphere. The artistic style is chaotic and intense, utilizing grunge elements and distressed textures to convey a sense of defiance. The layout features interwoven text and imagery, offering an avant-garde approach that emphasizes creativity over conventional readability. The typography is a mix of hand-drawn and digital styles, adding to the raw and edgy aesthetic of the design.
